location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 9 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd, the Imam of Muscat, intends to blockade the port of Bussora [Basra]. It is explained that this is the result of failed applications for redress with respect to tribute owed by the Government of Bagdad [Baghdad]. It is further explained that the Resident has reassured the Imam that the British would almost certainly not interfere if he choose to take such a course of action.It notes that the Resident is attempting to mediate between the Pasha of Bagdad, and the Imam of Muscat via Robert Taylor, the Resident at Bussora.
